title: Burnin' Up
lyrics:
Can't you see I'm burning up?
Can't you see I'm freezing too?
Bang bang, shoot the flare
Drifting somewhere and I don't know where
I'm Burnin' Up

I'm Burnin' Up

I'm Burnin' Up

Are you burning too?



Satellites drop from the sky

Queen at the gate won't let me by

Baby you speak so soft I can't hear

Please speak up, baby speak up dear



I'm Burnin' Up

I'm Burnin' Up

I'm Burnin' Up

Are you burning too?



Oh I wish I didn't care, but I do

I'm just like you and I'm burning too

Oh I wish I didn't care, but I do

I'm just like you and I'm burning too
